Text:
I'm still amazed by the number of people who grab these files without saying thank you.

As always from me, a big thank you.

Thanks, I really appreciate your comments. 
But for me, personally, there is no any problem ...
I really love and enjoy doing this project,
I believe that music is an essential part of healthy living,
 a form of therapy to help troubled minds
Everyone is welcome to join us 

PS

Berthold Auerbach (1812-1882)

Hi Zlatko, Phil and Dehou, nice to see your comments and music preferances.  For me music is a hobby I love to share with good friends. You are !!! Hope Robert Plant's video and live clips gave you some nice minutes, too. I'm in load of most of his CDs I bought some time before I covered ebay music auctions. But each CD of R.P. & Led Zeppelin was worth to spend the money for. The videos are a nice add-on and remind me of what the people looked and acted like in this phases. Let's continue our common hobby. Love & peace from Southern Germany, Beaujoulais.
thanks pupovaczlatko, keep it coming! we just love to have this graphic part of music history
